question:
You have decided to leave your current job and look for a new one.Write a letter to a friend. In your letter:
-explain why you want to leave your current job-describe what kind of job you are looking for-ask for some help or advice
text: How are you? Hope this letter finds you well. I am writing this letter to let you know about my resignation from my current job due to the lack of more technical work. In addition, job satisfaction is also a reason to put down my papers, despite, my core knowledge and hands-on experience in multiple industries.

As you know, I am from a core technical background with a real-time experience in critical issue solving and I would be excited  to get any such hardcore technical-related job. I am willing to relocate anywhere in the country as along there is good work to perform from my end. Last but not the least, no matter what kind of designation they will offer and I am ready to accept and move forward.

As you hear, about me and I would really need  advice on what should I do now and where should I go. Hence, please take the time and think about me and let me know your response and please do not hesitate to call me on mobile for a quick discussion.
I look forward to hearing your response. I hope it will come at the earliest.
